mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNTNC(SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, SNTNC_CN, SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY) VALUES (#{sntncEtprCode}, #{sntncWrtingEmplId}, #{sntncCn}, SYSDATE, 'SNTNC010')
mapper.select: SELECT s.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE, s.SNTNC_CN, s.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID, s.SNTNC_WRTING_DATE, s.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY, e.EMPL_NM, u.UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, u.UPLOAD_FILE_SN, u.UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE FROM SNTNC s JOIN EMPL e ON s.SNTNC_WRTING_EMPL_ID = e.EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE u ON s.SNTNC_ETPR_CODE = u.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE s.COMMON_CODE_SNTNC_CTGRY = 'SNTNC010' AND e.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = ( SELECT e1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL e1 WHERE e1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UPLOAD_FILE(UPLOAD_FILE_SN, UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE, UPLOAD_FILE_ORGINL_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM, UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_FILE_RGSDE) VALUES (UPLOAD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sntncEtprCode}, #{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
